title: Using the Basic-Fit N.V. Annual Report for FY 2024, calculate the Underlying Price-to-Earnings (P/E) Ratio using the year-end 2024 share price. Round the final ratio to 2 decimal places.
description:
To determine the Underlying Price-to-Earnings (P/E) Ratio for FY 2024, use the following formula: FY 2024 Closing Share Price divided by FY 2024 Diluted Underlying Net Result per Share.
 
 Search the Shareholder Information section of Basic-Fit’s 2024 Annual Report to locate the share price at year-end 2024. Record this value as €22.58.
 
 Search the Key Figures section of the Annual Report to locate the Diluted Underlying Net Result per Share. Record this value as €0.65. Ensure you use the diluted figure which adjusts for exceptional items and potential share dilution, based on the Underlying Net Result of €43.6 million.
 
 Calculate the final ratio: €22.58 / €0.65 = 34.7384…
 
 Round to two decimal places to arrive at a final ratio of 34.74.

rubric.criteria: Uses share price at year-end 2024 = €22.58 as an input
Uses the Diluted underlying net result per share = €0.65 as an input
Calculates final Underlying Price-to-Earnings Ratio for FY 2024 = 34.74, rounded to exactly two decimal places
